Message.Subject: Outlook Welcome Email
Message.Body: Dear user, welcome to our E-mail. Please follow the instructions in the previous message to activate your account!

Message.Subject: Outlook Activation Email
Message.Body: Dear user, welcome to our E-mail. We are happy to have you. Please follow the link to activate your account!

Message.Subject: 20 Qucik Recipes
Message.Body: Wow I can't believe it's already Friday!!!!!! Can you? We've put some of our favourite snack ideas on the blog. Check it out!

Message.Subject: Gala Night Invitation
Message.Body: Hello dear customer. This year we are celebrating our 5th birtday and would like to invite you to our Gala evening. Please notify us of your attendance by e-mail.
